info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 11:26PM MDT until July 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Brown County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Spink County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stratford, or 10 miles southeast of Aberdeen, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Verdon and Ferney. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
